bill_title: Commending and honoring Mike Grosek, owner of Mike's Jack and Jill in Webster, for being named South Dakota Retailer of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring Mike Grosek, owner of Mike's Jack and Jill in Webster, for being named South Dakota Retailer of the Year. WHEREAS, Mike Grosek began his entrepreneurial career working in a grocery store which he later purchased at the age of twenty-one; and WHEREAS, he has become a pillar in the Webster business community, known for his outstanding customer service, honesty, friendliness, and respect for all he meets; and WHEREAS, he has served as a role model for area youth, mentoring and employing many individuals, inspiring loyalty, and encouraging future generations of business owners with his generosity and goodwill; and WHEREAS, his dedication to the community is exemplified not only through his generous actions as a business owner, but also during his tenure as Mayor of Webster, his involvement with the VFW and American Legion baseball teams, and through his service on boards for the Chamber of Commerce, Lions Club, Fire Department, Lake Area Hospital, and Dakotah Manufacturing: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eightieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Mike Grosek be commended for being named South Dakota Retailer of the Year, and for his selfless and generous actions in the community.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring Mike Grosek, owner of Mike's Jack and Jill in Webster, for being named South Dakota Retailer of the Year. WHEREAS, Mike Grosek began his entrepreneurial career working in a grocery store which he later purchased at the age of twenty-one; and WHEREAS, he has become a pillar in the Webster business community, known for his outstanding customer service, honesty, friendliness, and respect for all he meets; and WHEREAS, he has served as a role model for area youth, mentoring and employing many individuals, inspiring loyalty, and encouraging future generations of business owners with his generosity and goodwill; and WHEREAS, his dedication to the community is exemplified not only through his generous actions as a business owner, but also during his tenure as Mayor of Webster, his involvement with the VFW and American Legion baseball teams, and through his service on boards for the Chamber of Commerce, Lions Club, Fire Department, Lake Area Hospital, and Dakotah Manufacturing: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eightieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Mike Grosek be commended for being named South Dakota Retailer of the Year, and for his selfless and generous actions in the community.
